content: I've just completely rewritten this PR. As such, I'm not really qualified for reviewing it anymore. Would someone mind doing so?

The titular PR defines uniformly convex/concave functions with a modulus, and strongly convex/concave functions as a special case. Would one of our resident convexity experts (eg @Yury G. Kudryashov or @Apurva Nakade) mind having a look?
If I don't do it in 24h, then please ping me again. I have some urgent grading to do, then I'll be available for Lean again.
Thanks for tagging me. I left comments about a few docstrings but otherwise don't have any other substantial changes to suggest.
